TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICredentials

summary.span: Fournit l'interface d'authentification de base pour récupérer les informations d'identification pour l'authentification du client web.

span.span: Provides the base authentication interface for retrieving credentials for Web client authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le interface fournit le méthode aux objets qui fournissent des informations d’identification réseau pour les applications.The interface provides the method to objects that supply network credentials to applications. ## Examples L’exemple suivant illustre comment utiliser le interface.The following example illustrates how to use the interface. [!code-cpp[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/CPP/icredential.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/CS/icredential.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/VB/icredential.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential (Uri uri, string authType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Net.NetworkCredential GetCredential(class System.Uri uri, string authType) cil managed
public: System::Net::NetworkCredential ^ GetCredential(Uri ^ uri, System::String ^ authType);
abstract member GetCredential : Uri * string -> System.Net.NetworkCredential

param.name: uri
param.span: pour lequel le client fournit des informations d’authentification.

span.span: The that the client is providing authentication for.

param.name: authType
param.span: Type d’authentification tel qu’il est défini dans la propriété .

span.span: The type of authentication, as defined in the property.

summary.span: Retourne un objet associé à l’URI et au type d’authentification spécifiés.

span.span: Returns a object that is associated with the specified URI, and authentication type.

returns.span: associé à l’URI et au type d’authentification spécifiés, ou si aucune information d’identification n’est disponible.

span.span: The that is associated with the specified URI and authentication type, or, if no credentials are available, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le méthode retourne un instance qui contient les informations d’identification qui sont associées avec le schéma d’URI et l’autorisation spécifié.The method returns a instance that contains the credentials that are associated with the specified URI and authorization scheme. Lorsqu’aucune information d’identification n’est disponibles, le méthode renvoie `null`.When no credentials are available, the method returns `null`. ## Examples Les utilisations suivantes pour récupérer un instance.The following uses to retrieve a instance. [!code-cpp[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/CPP/icredential.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/CS/icredential.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ICredential#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ICredential/VB/icredential.vb#1)]
